name: Midnight Snack (itsaka, Chodgy, wt64, Ogo0d4)
description:
John Paul Apolinar - Programmer

Belle Nguyen - Art

Connor Hodgson - Sound Design - https://connorhodgson.co.uk/

Wesley Lo - Music 

Controls 

WASD - Movement

E - Interact (with doors) 

You can hide from mom and avoid being spotted by entering hiding spots marked with a sparkle. 

You play as a hungry son, sneaking through the house in the dead of night in search of a delicious midnight snack. But be careful! Your mom is a light sleeper and will stop at nothing to prevent you from satisfying your cravings. 

Navigate through the house, avoiding creaky floorboards and dodging Mom's radar, all while gathering the ingredients for the perfect snack. Will you be able to make it to the kitchen and back to your room without getting caught? Or will Mom catch you red-handed and send you back to bed empty-stomached?
